TEXT: Isn't it a little unfair that you're not prepared to die while trying to kill another creature?
What is this ugly heart? It would be better to get rid of it.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. They have a familiar scent of blood to you. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~basic~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
